name: Wall-Bots
description:
Shine the light to help the astronaut move through the level, avoiding killer robots along the way.

Inspired by the keywords ROBOTS and KOJIMA at the No More Sweden game jam, Wall-Bots is a sneaking game designed to be played using a handheld projector. 

The game is projected out from the handheld projector over two walls in the corner of a room. Thanks to the tracking of the projector, the beam of light from it will seem to illuminate the level as if it is attached to the walls of the room.

It's an update to an older project, see below, which premiered at Automat Indie Arcade 2013. In it a Playstation Move-tracked projector was used to play a horror game in a dark room.



Uses the following free Asset Store assets:

  • Sci-Fi Texture Pack 2
  • AttackBot
  • FreeAnimatedSpaceMan
